titleStmt.title: An humble proposal to the honourable the knights, cityzens and burgesses in Parliament assembled, for employing and maintaining the poor of this kingdom, by erecting fisheries, and improving manufacturies
titleStmt.author: Cole, John, fl. 1700.

notesStmt.note: With a docket title: A proposal to maintain the poor, by erecting fisheries.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
